response.overview: It is rumored that the ancestral treasure and the elixir of immortality are hidden in the Mingduan Mountain outside Julu City, and people from all walks of life gather here. Liu Xu, who inherited the family secrets, had to embark on a journey because his daughter was ill. Lu Yushan, the daughter of Lu Yuanwai, a wealthy family in the city, was also among those who were looking for the elixir to save her father. However, the road to treasure hunting was full of dangers, and one person's strength was meager, so the two decided to go into the mountains together. At the same time, another ambitious team was also on the way. Psychedelic and strange monsters and unknown mechanisms were waiting for them. Who will get the elixir and treasure in the end? Everything is waiting to be revealed.
response.title: Dragon's Curse: The Hidden Treasure
